issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Dragging a view from the scrollView parent is going behind the white window. It only drags as far as the bounds of the scrollView. It works fine in iOS.
h4. Repro Steps
1. Add the attached files app.js and draggable.js to your project.
2. Run the app.
3. Try to drag the color boxes and you can see the issue. The color boxes drag behind the white window.
fields.summary: Android: Dragging a view from scrollView is going behind the window
fields.environment:
android 2.3.6
Samsung Galaxy SII
Ti SDK 2.1.2.GA

comments.body:
The problem reproduce with release 3.0.2 and master release 3.1.0

tested on

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
Device: Samsung galaxy s duos Android version: 4.0.4
Android Emulator: Android SDK version: 2.2
